subject: Hello ,
body:
Hello ,
Pardon my approach in contacting you through this medium, l got your details online while searching for a reliable person l can do business with. I am contacting you to assist in investing funds that belongs to a deceased client.The investment areas are relatively optional. I will give you more details immediately l hear from you. my email i.d 
balansagrobert97@gmail.com
Warm regards,
Robert Balansag.

subject: Re: Hello ,
body:
Hello Robert,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. I'm quite intrigued by your proposal, although I must admit, I don't have much experience in these matters. Could you please provide more information about the type of investment you're referring to? And how did you come across my details online?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Todd
